title: PBE
body:
Hello guys!,Today i was accepted as a tester on PBE...So,i download the client and than i launch.I make an account and when i`m in i have 1 ip ? Why... ? What should i make ? Its first time on pbe.. so please help me  ! :}
*

replies.body:
just go to store click on starters pack  an you will get millons of money
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=MastahPenta,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cAYMTbPL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-06T01:53:24.262+0000)
>
> just go to store click on starters pack  an you will get millons of money
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

you will also get riot points by the way
Your PBE balance should automatically update in a while after you log on, but playing a match can help force that too.  Hope that helps!
